content.rendered:
AMIs newest Journeyman!

Congratulations to Brady McNees, Casey Clarida, Chase Overbeck(not pictured),
and Brad Wilson, our newest graduates and a big thank you to the instructor Mike Blossom.
“What these gentlemen have earned is more valuable today than a college degree.
The Department of Labor Journeyman Certificate gets them higher wages and more
benefits all without any student loans! These individuals have been smart with their future
and we are blessed to have them be a part of the AMI family.”- Brian Potter

Congratulations to Brady McNees, Casey Clarida, Chase Overbeck (not pictured) and Brad Wilson, our newest graduates and a big thank you to the instructor Mike Blossom. "What these gentlemen have earned is more valuable today than a college degree .The Department of Labor Journeyman Certificate gets them higher wages and more benefits all without any student loans! These individuals have been smart with their future and we are blessed to have them be a part of the AMI family."- Brian Potter
